JobFullDesc: Microsoft Azure is undergoing explosive growth as customers around the world realize the benefits of moving their services and applications on to the cloud. For Azure, providing a secure cloud platform is vital to win customers and move their workloads to Azure. The charter of the Azure Security group is to ensure that Azure is the most secure and resilient cloud platform. If you are looking for a challenge and passionate about protecting Microsoft and customer’s assets in the cloud, Azure security team has the right role for you! This role will give you an opportunity to build the platform for managing various HSM workloads in Microsoft. You will directly contribute to Azure Key Vault Managed Hardware Security Module service and will play a critical role in providing Microsoft customers with world class high-speed cryptographic processing and key isolation. You will be working in a fast-paced environment to build and deliver reliable, highly-available, distributed services end-to-end that integrate with core Azure components like the base Compute Fabric, Software Defined Networking, Storage as well as world-class crypto-processing hardware. As a senior engineer in the team, you will be a technical lead of the project and design critical pieces of the service. This role provides an opportunity to:Work on cutting edge security technologies like confidential computingBuild scalable microservices in the cloudBuild and refine a state machine for managing the lifetime of critical resourcesBuild a low-touch, auto-recovering control system for reducing COGS and improving securityResponsibilitiesWe are looking for candidates with strong software design and coding skills. This role requires a technically proficient engineer who has experience building a scalable production system and operationalizing it. Your primary responsibilities are to design, code and operationalize a new highly performant and scalable Azure security service targeted at extremely sensitive crypto-processing workloads.
